What is this anime in which the protagonist has a black spiral tattoo down both arms called? I need to find the name of this anime.

The main character had a black spiral tattoo going down both his arms, which also could be changed into swords
He has grey hair with a black cloak ripped by his feet
Kinda fitted a ninja category
I saw this anime on SBS2 or just SBS around about 7 to 9 years ago.

What's this anime with a character with a black spiral tattoo that can turn into swords? There's this anime that my brothers and I would watch when we were little. It came on one of the SBS channels.
One of the main characters had a black spiral tattoo going down both his arms which also could be changed into swords. He had either silver hair or a pale blue hair color, and he also wears a black body cloak which was ripped by his feet.
This anime kind of fitted in the ninja category...
Please help me find the name of this old anime (which COULD roughly be around maybe 8 years ago slight possibility)
